issue.title: [C++] Add Apache 2.0 license file to the Parquet-testing repository
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4345](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4345). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The parquet-testing repository is used as a git submodule in the Apache Arrow repository, but doesn't currently have a license file:

    <https://github.com/apache/arrow/tree/master/cpp/submodules>

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4345?focusedCommentId=16753576) by Uwe Korn (uwe):*
`[~rdmello]` Can you make a PR with the license to the repo?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4345?focusedCommentId=16755426) by Rylan Dmello (rdmello):*
Hi Uwe, I don't think I can get to this until the next week or so. If you have the bandwidth for this, please feel free to take ownership of this story.
